Package stocking.Battery

Interface BatteryExternalControlI

All Known Subinterfaces:
BatteryExternalControlCI
All Known Implementing Classes:
Battery, BatteryExternalConnector, BatteryExternalControlInboundPort, BatteryExternalControlOutboundPort
public interface BatteryExternalControlI
The interface BatteryExternalControlI declares the signatures of service implementations accessible to the external controller.

Description

Black-box Invariant

 invariant      getCurrentPowerLevel() <= getMaxPowerCapacity()

Created on : 2023-10-15

Author:
Daniel SIMA
